name: aesthetic-computer-micro
description: A portable Fedora based environment for running and hacking on aesthetic-computer.

scripts.reset-and-boot: npm run reset; npm run boot
scripts.build: cp ../dotfiles/dot_config/emacs.el machine/emacs.el; mkdir -p machine/.emacs.d; docker build -t aesthetic-micro machine
scripts.boot: parentDir=$(dirname $(pwd)); cd machine; if [[ $parentDir =~ ^/[a-zA-Z]/ ]]; then parentDir=$(echo $parentDir | sed 's|^/\([a-zA-Z]\)/|\1:/|'); fi; if [ -z "$(docker ps -aq -f name=aesthetic-container)" ]; then npm run build && docker run -d -p 8888:8888 -p 8889:8889 --hostname aesthetic --env-file .env --env-file github.env --env-file netlify.env --env-file vercel.env --env-file stripe.env -e GIT_USER_EMAIL="$(git config --global user.email)" -e GIT_USER_NAME="$(git config --global user.name)" -v "${parentDir}/micro/machine/.emacs.d:/home/me/.emacs.d" -v "${parentDir}:/home/me/aesthetic-computer" --user me --platform linux/amd64 --name aesthetic-container -it aesthetic-micro /usr/bin/fish entry.fish; else docker start aesthetic-container; fi
scripts.reset: cd machine; docker ps -q -a --filter 'name=aesthetic-container' | xargs -r docker rm -f; docker rmi aesthetic-micro -f

author: Jeffrey Alan Scudder
